title: After the prank….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Chika! I did the plan that we came up with yesterday. It was a huge success!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Wah, you fooled Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yeah, completely! Well, if you’re someone like Nico, even Maki will easily fall for it. What about on your side, Chika?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Riko-chan was….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What’s with that face?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Nothing…. I think I fooled Riko-chan, but I feel like she actually figured it out….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Are you sure you didn’t just imagine it? It’s a plan that you formulated with the great Nico, so there’s no way that it would fail<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Really? It’s good if that’s the case…. Ah, a message?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I got one too. Who is…. Uwaah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ni- Ni- Ni- Ni-, Nico-san! I-, I’ve…. I’ve been found out!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Me too…. It seems that Riko contacted Maki…. They found out that we’re working together….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Wh- wh- wh-, what should we do----!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>If it’s like this, there’s no other choice. We’re using our last resort….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>W-, what is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Chika, we’re going to kneel to them!!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeeh---!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
